title: Getting out of bronze is easy you're bad if you can't doit, Silver though is pure luck proof
body:
Getting out of silver is pure luck
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1869181290/43832487
Dumpstered these kids early mid then 2 afk don't lose until 20~30 minutes later
We kept beating them 3v5 until we evuantly just lost a teamfight because its 3v5!
This is proof silver is pure luck
Those 2 afk'd out of the blue 
we flat out played better and lose because of something completely out of our control 
I was so fucking salt
